```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library (readxl)
library (here)
library(kableExtra)
```
```{r}
#read in data
fish <- read_csv(here("data","fish.csv"))
```
```{r}
kelp_abur <- read_excel(here("data", "kelp_fronds.xlsx"), sheet = "abur")
```
```{r}
fish_garibaldi <- fish %>%
  filter (common_name=="garibaldi")
```
```{r}
fish_mohk <- fish %>%
  filter (site=="mohk")
```
